name: phpro/grumphp
description: A composer plugin that enables source code quality checks.

suggest.atoum/atoum: Lets GrumPHP run your unit tests.
suggest.behat/behat: Lets GrumPHP validate your project features.
suggest.codeception/codeception: Lets GrumPHP run your project's full stack tests
suggest.codegyre/robo: Lets GrumPHP run your automated PHP tasks.
suggest.doctrine/orm: Lets GrumPHP validate your Doctrine mapping files.
suggest.friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer: Lets GrumPHP automatically fix your codestyle.
suggest.jakub-onderka/php-parallel-lint: Lets GrumPHP quickly lint your entire code base.
suggest.malukenho/kawaii-gherkin: Lets GrumPHP lint your Gherkin files.
suggest.nikic/php-parser: Lets GrumPHP run static analyses through your PHP files.
suggest.phing/phing: Lets GrumPHP run your automated PHP tasks.
suggest.phpmd/phpmd: Lets GrumPHP sort out the mess in your code
suggest.phpunit/phpunit: Lets GrumPHP run your unit tests.
suggest.roave/security-advisories: Lets GrumPHP be sure that there are no known security issues.
suggest.sensiolabs/security-checker: Lets GrumPHP be sure that there are no known security issues.
suggest.squizlabs/php_codesniffer: Lets GrumPHP sniff on your code.
suggest.sstalle/php7cc: Lets GrumPHP check PHP 5.3 - 5.6 code compatibility with PHP 7.
